Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I'm a rather new KSP-user who decided to download KSP after the Rosetta-mission (yeah, bandwaggon) and I'm absolutely amazed by the game.

I've already seen that this place is VERY helpful and filled with veterans willing to share their knowledge, so I'm looking forward to my time here.

IRL I'm 31, living and working in Austria, unfortunately not in engineering or anything related, but I hope that I will not send too many Kerbals to their fiery deaths.

Cheers!

Welcome to the forum!

Always nice to see new people around here.
